title: 107: Artificial Intelligence vs. Authentic Ignorance | Hotep Jesus
description:
To say that the world is changing is an understatement, but it’s the way it is changing that should create cause for concern. As technology is advancing, the social climate is collapsing through orchestrated color revolutions by outside influences.

Tech entrepreneur Hotep Jesus explains where business is heading in this new world and why he’s investing heavily in Bitcoin and the artificial intelligence industry through his companies.

Can society come together to fight the real enemy, or will we allow the powers-that-be to divide the public by race, economics, and political parties? Hotep Jesus has some thoughts on what to do in the face of societal manipulation, and how to profit in the New Economy.
